mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (customer_number, name, email, phone_number, date_of_birth, gender, id_number, customer_type, risk_level, status, address, city, country, postal_code) VALUES (#{customerNumber}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{gender}, #{idNumber}, #{customerType}, #{riskLevel}, #{status}, #{address}, #{city}, #{country}, #{postalCode})
mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, gender, id_number as idNumber, customer_type as customerType, risk_level as riskLevel, status, address, city, country, postal_code as postalCode, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, last_login_at as lastLoginAt FROM customers WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, gender, id_number as idNumber, customer_type as customerType, risk_level as riskLevel, status, address, city, country, postal_code as postalCode, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, last_login_at as lastLoginAt FROM customers WHERE customer_number = #{customerNumber}

SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, gender, id_number as idNumber, customer_type as customerType, risk_level as riskLevel, status, address, city, country, postal_code as postalCode, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, last_login_at as lastLoginAt FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address}, city = #{city}, country = #{country}, postal_code = #{postalCode}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
